statements: SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM urban_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM urban_projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT DISTINCT project_location FROM urban_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM urban_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status, project_location FROM urban_projects WHERE project_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_status, project_location FROM urban_projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM urban_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_status ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_location, zoning_regulations FROM urban_projects WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM urban_projects WHERE project_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM urban_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_type FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE project_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_status='active';
SELECT * FROM project WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_type = 'Building';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_status FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_status = 'Active' ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM project JOIN zoning_regulations ON project.project_name = zoning_regulations.regulation_name;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM Projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT p.project_name, z.regulation_name FROM Projects p INNER JOIN ProjectZoningMapping m ON p.project_id = m.project_id INNER JOIN ZoningRegulations z ON m.regulation_id = z.regulation_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Projects;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, description FROM ZoningRegulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Projects WHERE budget > 50000;

SELECT project_id, project_name, regulation_name FROM Projects INNER JOIN ProjectZoningMapping ON Projects.project_id = ProjectZoningMapping.project_id INNER JOIN ZoningRegulations ON ProjectZoningMapping.regulation_id = ZoningRegulations.regulation_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, project_budget FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT zone_id, zone_name, zone_description FROM ZoningRegulations;
SELECT permit_id, project_id, permit_date, permit_type, permit_status FROM BuildingPermits;
SELECT project_name, project_description, completion_date, project_budget FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT * FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE project_budget > 50000;
SELECT * FROM ZoningRegulations ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, project_budget FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT p.project_name, b.permit_date, b.permit_type FROM UrbanDevelopmentProjects p JOIN BuildingPermits b ON p.project_id = b.project_id WHERE b.permit_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM Urban_Development_Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, project_cost FROM Urban_Development_Projects ORDER BY project_cost DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM Urban_Development_Projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT municipality_name, mayor_name, population FROM Municipalities WHERE population > 50000;
SELECT p.project_name, e.evaluator_name, e.evaluation_date FROM Project_Evaluations e JOIN Urban_Development_Projects p ON e.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Project_Evaluations WHERE evaluation_result = 'Approved';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Urban_Development_Projects WHERE project_cost > 50000 ORDER BY project_cost DESC;
SELECT municipality_name, mayor_name, population FROM Municipalities WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT * FROM Zoning_Regulations WHERE zone_id = 3 AND regulation_status = 'Active' ORDER BY regulation_id ASC;
SELECT violation_type, violation_description, penalty_amount FROM Zoning_Violations WHERE project_id = 1001;
